00078 // Precondition: on doit etre en 2D (dimension d'espace=2)
00079 // Parametre: Entree& is
00080 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00081 // Valeurs par defaut:
00082 // Contraintes:
00083 // Acces: entree/sortie
00084 // Exception: l'objet a mailler n'est pas du type Domaine

00094 //! Fonction principale de l'interprete Extruder_en20<br>Triangule 1 a 1 toutes les zones du domaine<br>specifie par la directive.<br>On triangule la zone grace a la methode:<br>void Extruder_en20::extruder(Zone\& zone) const<br>Extruder signifie ici transformer en triangle des<br>elements geometrique d'une zone.
00095 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00096 Signification: le flot d'entree<br>
00097 Contraintes: */
00098 Entree& Extruder_en20::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00099 {
00100   Nom nom_dom;
00101   Param param(que_suis_je());
00102   param.ajouter("domaine",&nom_dom,Param::REQUIRED);
00103   param.ajouter("nb_tranches",&NZ,Param::REQUIRED);
00104   param.ajouter_arr_size_predefinie("direction",&direction,Param::REQUIRED);
00105   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00106   associer_domaine(nom_dom);
00107   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(domaine());
00108   extruder(domaine());
00109   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(domaine());
00110   return is;
00111 }
00112 
00113 // Precondition:
00114 // Parametre: Zone& zone
00115 // Signification: la zone dont on veut raffiner les elements
00116 // Valeurs par defaut:
00117 // Contraintes:
00118 // Acces: entree/sortie
00119 // 
00120 // Signification:
00121 // Contraintes:
00122 // Exception:
00123 // Effets de bord:
00124 // Postcondition: la methode ne modifie pas l'objet
00125 //
00126 //
00127 //
00128 //
00129 //! Triangule tous les element d'une zone: transforme<br>les elements goemetriques de la zone en triangles.<br>Pour l'instant on ne sait raffiner que des Rectangles<br>(on les coupe en 4).
00130 void Extruder_en20::extruder(Domaine& dom)
00131 {
00132   Zone& zone = dom.zone(0);
00133 
00134   if (zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Rectangle" || zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() ==  "Quadrangle" )
00135     {
00136       Cerr << " The extrusion of quadrangle is made by Extruder and not by Extruder_en20 " << finl;
00137       exit();
00138     }
00139   else if( zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Triangle")
00140     {
00141       int oldnbsom = zone.nb_som();
00142       IntTab& les_elems=zone.les_elems();
00143       int oldsz=les_elems.dimension(0);
00144       double dx = direction(0)/NZ;
00145       double dy = direction(1)/NZ;
00146       double dz = direction(2)/NZ;
00147 
00148       Faces les_faces;
00149 // zone.creer_faces(les_faces);
00150       {
00151 // bloc a factoriser avec Zone_VF.cpp :
00152         Type_Face type_face = zone.type_elem().type_face(0);
00153         les_faces.typer(type_face);
00154         les_faces.associer_zone(zone);
00155 
00156         Static_Int_Lists connectivite_som_elem;
00157         const int     nb_sommets_tot = zone.domaine().nb_som_tot();
00158         const IntTab&    elements       = zone.les_elems();
00159 
00160         construire_connectivite_som_elem(nb_sommets_tot,
00161                                          elements,
00162                                          connectivite_som_elem,
00163                                          1 /* include virtual elements */);
00164 
00165         Faces_builder faces_builder;
00166         IntTab elem_faces; //!< Tableau dont on aura pas besoin
00167         faces_builder.creer_faces_reeles(zone,
00168                                          connectivite_som_elem,
00169                                          les_faces,
00170                                          elem_faces);
00171       }
00172       const int nbfaces2D = les_faces.nb_faces();
00173 
00174 
00175       int newnbsom = oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+nbfaces2D*NZ+oldnbsom*NZ;
00176       DoubleTab new_soms(newnbsom, 3);
00177       DoubleTab& coord_sommets=dom.les_sommets();
00178       Objet_U::dimension=3;
00179 
00180 
00181 // les sommets du maillage 2D sont translates en premier
00182       for (int i=0; i<oldnbsom; i++)
00183         {
00184           double x = coord_sommets(i,0);
00185           double y = coord_sommets(i,1);
00186           double z=0;
00187           if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00188             z=coord_sommets(i,2);
00189           for (int k=0; k<=NZ; k++)
00190             {
00191               new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,0)=x;
00192               new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,1)=y;
00193               new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,2)=z;
00194 
00195               x += dx;
00196               y += dy;
00197               z += dz;
00198             }
00199         }
00200 
00201 
00202 // creation des centres de gravite des elements 2D puis translation de ces points
00203       for (int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00204         {
00205           int i0=les_elems(i,0);
00206           int i1=les_elems(i,1);
00207           int i2=les_elems(i,2);
00208 
00209           double xg = 1./3.*(coord_sommets(i0,0)+coord_sommets(i1,0)+coord_sommets(i2,0))+0.5*dx;
00210           double yg = 1./3.*(coord_sommets(i0,1)+coord_sommets(i1,1)+coord_sommets(i2,1))+0.5*dy;
00211           double z = 0.5*dz;
00212           if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00213             z = 1./3.*(coord_sommets(i0,2)+coord_sommets(i1,2)+coord_sommets(i2,2))+0.5*dz;
00214           for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00215             {
00216 
00217               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+i,0)=xg;
00218               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+i,1)=yg;
00219               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+i,2)=z;
00220 
00221               xg += dx;
00222               yg += dy;
00223               z  += dz;
00224             }
00225         }
00226 
00227 
00228 // creation des centres des faces du maillage 2D puis translation de ces points
00229       for (int i=0; i<nbfaces2D; i++)
00230         {
00231           int i0=les_faces.sommet(i,0);
00232           int i1=les_faces.sommet(i,1);
00233 
00234           double x01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,0)+coord_sommets(i1,0))+0.5*dx;
00235           double y01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,1)+coord_sommets(i1,1))+0.5*dy;
00236           double z = 0.5*dz;
00237           if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00238             z = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,2)+coord_sommets(i1,2))+0.5*dz;
00239           for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00240             {
00241               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+i,0)=x01;
00242               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+i,1)=y01;
00243               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+i,2)=z;
00244               x01 += dx;
00245               y01 += dy;
00246               z   += dz;
00247             }
00248         }
00249 
00250 // creation des centres des aretes du maillage 2D puis translation de ces points
00251       for (int i=0; i<oldnbsom; i++)
00252         {
00253           double x = coord_sommets(i,0)+0.5*dx;
00254           double y = coord_sommets(i,1)+ 0.5*dy;
00255           double z = 0.5*dz;
00256           if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00257             z=coord_sommets(i,2)+0.5*dz;
00258           for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00259             {
00260               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+k*oldnbsom+i,0)=x;
00261               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+k*oldnbsom+i,1)=y;
00262               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+k*oldnbsom+i,2)=z;
00263               x += dx;
00264               y += dy;
00265               z += dz;
00266             }
00267         }
00268 
00269 
00270       coord_sommets.reset();
00271       dom.ajouter(new_soms);
00272 
00273       int newnbelem = 20*NZ*oldsz;
00274       IntTab new_elems(newnbelem, 4); //!< les nouveaux elements
00275       int cpt=0;
00276 
00277 
00278 // en premier, on stocke les tetra du haut et du bas : NZ*nb_triangle*2 tetra
00279       for (int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00280         {
00281           int i0=les_elems(i,0);
00282           int i1=les_elems(i,1);
00283           int i2=les_elems(i,2);
00284 
00285           int ig=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+i;
00286 
00287           for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00288             {
00289               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,0) = i0;
00290               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,1) = i1;
00291               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,2) = i2;
00292               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,3) = ig;
00293               cpt++;
00294 
00295               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,0) = i0+oldnbsom;
00296               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,1) = i1+oldnbsom;
00297               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,2) = i2+oldnbsom;
00298               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,3) = ig;
00299               cpt++;
00300 
00301               mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,i,2*k*oldsz+2*i,2);
00302 
00303               i0+=oldnbsom;
00304               i1+=oldnbsom;
00305               i2+=oldnbsom;
00306               ig+=oldsz;
00307             }
00308         }
00309 
00310 
00311 
00312 // puis les autres tetras
00313       for (int i=0; i<nbfaces2D; i++)
00314         {
00315           for (int ivois=0; ivois<2; ivois++)
00316             {
00317               int elem = les_faces.voisin(i,ivois);
00318 
00319               if (elem>=0)
00320                 {
00321                   int i0=les_faces.sommet(i,0);
00322                   int i1=les_faces.sommet(i,1);
00323                   int i01=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+i;
00324 
00325                   for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00326                     {
00327                       int ig=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+elem;
00328 
00329                       int i00=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+i0;
00330                       int i11=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+i1;
00331 // int i00=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+k*oldnbsom+i0;
00332 // int i11=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+k*oldnbsom+i1;
00333 
00334                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i0;
00335                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i1;
00336                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00337                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00338 
00339                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i0+oldnbsom;
00340                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i1+oldnbsom;
00341                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00342                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00343 
00344                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i1;
00345                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i11;
00346                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00347                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00348 
00349                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i11;
00350                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i1+oldnbsom;
00351                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00352                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00353 
00354                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i0;
00355                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i00;
00356                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00357                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00358 
00359                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i00;
00360                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i0+oldnbsom;
00361                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00362                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00363 
00364 
00365                       i0+=oldnbsom;
00366                       i1+=oldnbsom;
00367                       i01+=nbfaces2D;
00368                       ig+=oldsz;
00369                     }
00370                 }
00371             }
00372         }
00373 
00374       les_elems.ref(new_elems);
00375 
00376 // Reconstruction de l'octree
00377       zone.invalide_octree();
00378       zone.typer("Tetraedre");
00379 
00380       extruder_dvt(dom, les_faces,oldnbsom, oldsz);
00381 
00382     }
00383   else
00384     {
00385       Cerr << "It is not known yet how to extrude "
00386            << zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() <<"s"<<finl;
00387       exit();
00388     }
00389 }

00391 
00392 
00393 void Extruder_en20::traiter_faces_dvt(Faces& les_faces_bord, Faces& les_faces, int oldnbsom, int oldsz, int nbfaces2D )
00394 {
00395   int size_2D = les_faces_bord.nb_faces();
00396 
00397   IntTab les_sommets(6*size_2D*NZ, 3);
00398 
00399   for (int i=0; i<size_2D; i++)
00400     {
00401       int i0=les_faces_bord.sommet(i,0);
00402       int i1=les_faces_bord.sommet(i,1);
00403 
00404 // double x01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,0)+coord_sommets(i1,0));
00405 // double y01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,1)+coord_sommets(i1,1));
00406 
00407 // on recherche le numero de cette face de bord: pas top!
00408       int jface=-1;
00409       for (int iface=0; iface<nbfaces2D; iface++)
00410         {
00411           int j0=les_faces.sommet(iface,0);
00412           int j1=les_faces.sommet(iface,1);
00413 
00414           if (((i0==j0) &&(i1==j1)) || ((i0==j1) &&(i1==j0)))
00415             {
00416               jface=iface;
00417               break;
00418             }
00419         }
00420       assert(jface>=0);
00421 
00422       for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00423         {
00424 // double z = (k+0.5)*dz;
00425 // int i01 = zone.chercher_sommets(x01, y01, z);
00426           int j01 = oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+jface;
00427 
00428           int i00=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+i0;
00429           int i11=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+i1;
00430 // int i00=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+k*oldnbsom+i0;
00431 // int i11=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+NZ*nbfaces2D+k*oldnbsom+i1;
00432 
00433           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i,0) = i0;
00434           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i,1) = i1;
00435           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i,2) = j01;
00436 
00437           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+1,0) = j01;
00438           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+1,1) = i1;
00439           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+1,2) = i11;
00440 
00441           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+2,0) = j01;
00442           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+2,1) = i11;
00443           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+2,2) = i1+oldnbsom;
00444 
00445           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+3,0) = j01;
00446           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+3,1) = i0+oldnbsom;
00447           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+3,2) = i1+oldnbsom;
00448 
00449           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+4,0) = j01;
00450           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+4,1) = i0+oldnbsom;
00451           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+4,2) = i00;
00452 
00453           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+5,0) = j01;
00454           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+5,1) = i00;
00455           les_sommets(k*6*size_2D+6*i+5,2) = i0;
00456 
00457           i0+=oldnbsom;
00458           i1+=oldnbsom;
00459         }
00460     }
00461 
00462   les_faces_bord.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00463   les_faces_bord.les_sommets().ref(les_sommets);
00464   les_faces_bord.voisins().resize(6*size_2D*NZ, 2);
00465   les_faces_bord.voisins()=-1;
00466 }

00468 
00469 
00470 void Extruder_en20::extruder_dvt(Domaine& dom, Faces& les_faces, int oldnbsom, int oldsz)
00471 {
00472   Zone& zone = dom.zone(0);
00473   const int nbfaces2D = les_faces.nb_faces();
00474   IntTab& les_elems=zone.les_elems();
00475   {
00476     LIST_CURSEUR(Bord) curseur(zone.faces_bord());
00477     while(curseur)
00478       {
00479         Faces& les_faces_bord=curseur->faces();
00480         traiter_faces_dvt(les_faces_bord, les_faces, oldnbsom, oldsz, nbfaces2D );
00481         ++curseur;
00482       }
00483   }
00484   {
00485     LIST_CURSEUR(Raccord) curseur(zone.faces_raccord());
00486     while(curseur)
00487       {
00488         Faces& les_faces_bord=curseur.valeur()->faces();
00489         traiter_faces_dvt(les_faces_bord, les_faces, oldnbsom, oldsz, nbfaces2D );
00490         ++curseur;
00491       }
00492   }
00493 
00494   Bord& devant = zone.faces_bord().add(Bord());
00495   devant.nommer("devant");
00496   Faces& les_faces_dvt=devant.faces();
00497   les_faces_dvt.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00498 
00499   IntTab som_dvt(oldsz, 3);
00500   les_faces_dvt.voisins().resize(oldsz, 2);
00501   les_faces_dvt.voisins()=-1;
00502 
00503   Bord& derriere = zone.faces_bord().add(Bord());
00504   derriere.nommer("derriere");
00505   Faces& les_faces_der=derriere.faces();
00506   les_faces_der.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00507 
00508   IntTab som_der(oldsz, 3);
00509   les_faces_der.voisins().resize(oldsz, 2);
00510   les_faces_der.voisins()=-1;
00511 
00512   for (int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00513     {
00514       int i0=les_elems(2*i,0);
00515       int i1=les_elems(2*i,1);
00516       int i2=les_elems(2*i,2);
00517 
00518       som_dvt(i,0) = i0;
00519       som_dvt(i,1) = i1;
00520       som_dvt(i,2) = i2;
00521 
00522       som_der(i,0) = i0+oldnbsom*NZ;
00523       som_der(i,1) = i1+oldnbsom*NZ;
00524       som_der(i,2) = i2+oldnbsom*NZ;
00525 
00526     }
00527
